title: Aging and Elderly Care in Catalonia
intro: The perception that there are many elderly people in Catalonia sparked my curiosity to verify it with data...
section_elderly_distribution: Where do elderly people live in Catalonia?
section_elderly_distribution_desc: To understand the territorial distribution of elderly people in Catalonia, two indicators are used to identify where the population aged 65 and over is concentrated and how it has evolved over time:
indicator_population: Percentage of population aged 65 and over
section_residential_places: Sufficiency of residential places for the elderly population
section_evolution: Evolution of elderly population and care services over time
trend_population_services: Population and services trend by county
trend_population_65: Trend of population aged 65 and over
trend_indicator_65: Trend of population indicator aged 65 and over
